properties.description: Detects the download of suspicious file types via common command-line utilities (e.g., curl, powershell).
properties.query:
parse_sysmon()
| where EventID == 1
| where CommandLine has_any ('curl', 'Invoke-WebRequest', 'certutil')
| where CommandLine has_any ('.doc', '.xls', '.ppt', '.pdf', '.zip')
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CommandLine, UserName
